Package game

Interface Food

All Known Implementing Classes:
Bush, Corpse, Egg, FertileGround, Fish, FoodItem, Fruit, Lake, MealKitsItem, Pterodactyl, Tree
public interface Food
Interface to be implemented by all classes that represent Food, including FoodItem, Ground that can grow Food or DinoActors that are small enough to be eaten whole

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean canEat​(CapableActor capableActor, Location location)
    Returns true if Food at location can be eaten by CapableActor, false otherwise.
    int eat​(GameMap map, Location location, int biteSize)
    Simulates DinoActor eating Food, and makes the Food disappear if it is eaten completely, finally returns the amount of food points gained by the eating the Food.
    java.lang.String foodName()
    Returns name of the Food

  • Method Details

    • foodName

      java.lang.String foodName()
      Returns name of the Food
      Returns:
      name of the Food

    • canEat

      boolean canEat​(CapableActor capableActor, Location location)
      Returns true if Food at location can be eaten by CapableActor, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      capableActor - A CapableActor
      location - Location of the Food
      Returns:
      true if Food can be eaten by CapableActor, false otherwise

    • eat

      int eat​(GameMap map, Location location, int biteSize)
      Simulates DinoActor eating Food, and makes the Food disappear if it is eaten completely, finally returns the amount of food points gained by the eating the Food.
      Parameters:
      map - map the Actor is on
      location - location the Actor is at
      biteSize - jaw size of the Actor that is trying to eat
      Returns:
      amount of food points gained by eating the Food
